description.value:
Totem of Cuckoo

Totem Spirit (Cunning) — Creation Cost: 6 Gnosis

Spirit Aspect: Infiltration / Manipulation / Social Parasitism

Recommended Umbra Spirits (CR 8+)

To bind Cuckoo, the pack must confront a spirit of intrusion, misplacement, and assumed authority. Suitable spirits include:

  • Elder Nest-Thief Spirit (Cuckoo Aspect) — Suggested base: Spirit-empowered infiltrator or illusionist (CR 9–11), focused on deception and social manipulation rather than combat
  • False Credential Spirit — Suggested base: Rakshasa-like or social-control stat block (CR 8–10), stripped of fiendish allegiance and treated as a pure spirit of infiltration
  • Borrowed Name Spirit — Suggested base: Changeling-style or illusion-focused fey spirit (CR 8–9), emphasizing identity theft and misdirection

These spirits prefer manipulation over violence and often test the pack by placing them where they do not belong and seeing if they can remain.

Individual Trait

The creature who touches the Totem gains the following benefit until the next long rest:

  • You gain advantage on Charisma (Deception) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks
  • Once per long rest, when a creature questions your authority, identity, or presence, you may force that creature to make a Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check. On a failure, the creature accepts that you belong where you are and does not challenge you further unless given clear cause

Only one creature may benefit from this trait at a time.

Pack Trait — Overlooked Presence

As an action, a creature touching the Totem may designate one willing pack member to invoke Cuckoo's blessing.

For up to 10 minutes, while within 30 feet of the Totem:

  • Creatures assume the chosen pack member has permission, clearance, or a valid reason to be present
  • Guards, officials, and authority figures do not challenge the character unless: the character performs a hostile act; the character draws deliberate attention to themselves; or the situation would obviously prohibit their presence (DM discretion)
  • If the character takes an action that would draw attention, they must immediately make a Charisma (Deception) check against a DC set by the DM: on a success, suspicion fades; on a failure, the effect ends immediately

Only one pack member may benefit from this effect at a time.

Ban — Always Improve Your Position

Cuckoo demands ruthless opportunism.

The pack must not ignore a clear opportunity to improve its situation at the expense of others, when such an opportunity presents itself without unacceptable risk.

If the pack consistently refuses advantage out of misplaced mercy, pride, or hesitation, the Totem becomes dormant and all its benefits cease.

To restore the Totem, the pack leader must reinvest the required Gnosis cost to reaffirm the bond.

If the pack repeatedly or egregiously violates this Ban, Cuckoo may withdraw entirely, permanently severing itself from the Totem at the Storyteller's discretion.

Totem rules: Only one Totem per pack; benefits do not stack; a dormant Totem provides no benefits. Once a Totem benefit is used, it cannot be used again until after a long rest. Interacting with a Totem requires 1 action while touching it; choose either the Individual Trait or the Pack Trait.
